title: Switch Drawing MicroSim
description: Interactive simulation demonstrating electrical on/off switch symbols in horizontal and vertical orientations with toggleable states
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Switch Symbols
Circuit Diagrams
Electrical Components
Circuit Control
Open and Closed Circuits
learningObjectives: Understand the key concepts of switch drawing
Explore switch drawing through interactive visualization
Apply knowledge of switch drawing to solve problems
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on switch drawing
